renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A
Buffer C

renderpass.code:
#define T(u) texture(iChannel0,(u)/iResolution.xy)
#define T1(u) texture(iChannel1,(u)/iResolution.xy)
#define T2(u) texture(iChannel2,(u)/iResolution.xy)
#define T3(u) (1. - texture(iChannel3,(u)/iResolution.xy))
#define T3n(u) (1. - texture(iChannel3,(u)))

#define R (iResolution.xy)

#define pal(a,b,c,d,e) ((a) + (b)*sin((c)*(d) + (e)))
#define rot(m) mat2(cos(m),-sin(m),sin(m),cos(m))
#define pi acos(-1.)
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer D
